api_list.api_description: Retrieve top 50 exchanges and markets for a specific coin.
Get list of supported dexes on a network.

query: Find the top markets and exchanges for a specific cryptocurrency and also list all decentralized exchanges supported on a blockchain network.

api_list.api_description: Retrieves time-intervaled data for the provided symbol.
Returns price history for selected pair.

optional_parameters.name: hours
optional_parameters.description: Number of hours back to get prices for.

optional_parameters.name: data_points
optional_parameters.description: Number of data points to retrieve.

query: Can you retrieve the trading data for BTC/USD on Gemini and also provide the price history for Bitcoin to Litecoin exchange on N.exchange over the last hour?

api_list.api_description: Retrieves all available symbols for trading.
Retrieve bank details by providing an IFSC code.

required_parameters.name: ifsc_code
required_parameters.description: The IFSC code of the bank branch.

query: Can you provide a list of all available trading symbols and also give me the details of a bank?

api_list.api_description: Get OHLC (open/high/low/close) data for a given market.

required_parameters.name: pair
required_parameters.description: Asset pair to get data for

optional_parameters.name: since
optional_parameters.description: Return up to 720 OHLC data points since given timestamp

api_list.api_description: Returns price history for selected pair.

optional_parameters.name: hours
optional_parameters.description: Number of hours back to get prices for.

optional_parameters.name: data_points
optional_parameters.description: Number of data points to retrieve.

A list of all markets.

optional_parameters.description: The number of markets to retrieve.

api_list.api_description: Get the total price to buy one bitcoin or ether.

query: Can you provide the current buy price on Coinbase and the best bid and ask prices on Kucoin?

api_list.api_description: Get current exchange rates. Default base currency is USD.

optional_parameters.name: currencies
optional_parameters.description: Comma-separated list of cryptocurrencies to be converted into fiat (e.g., 'BTC,ETH').

required_parameters.description: The ID of the quote currency.
